# Tyler McCulloch — AI-Readable Portfolio Summary
# https://jtylermc.ca
# Last updated: 2026-01-18

## Identity
Name: J Tyler McCulloch
Also known as: Tyler McCulloch
Role: Game Designer & Director
Location: Vancouver, BC, Canada
Email: jtylermc@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jtylermc/
Portfolio: https://jtylermc.ca

## Professional Summary
Game Designer and Director with 22+ years of experience across AAA, VR, mobile, and live service platforms. 12+ years in design leadership. 15 shipped titles. Specializes in creative direction, player-first design philosophy, and leading multidisciplinary teams from concept to ship.

## Notable Shipped Titles
- Pistol Whip (2019-2025) — Game Director at Cloudhead Games — Award-winning VR rhythm-shooter
- Journey to Foundation (2022) — Co-Creative Director at Archiact Interactive — VR RPG based on Isaac Asimov's saga
- Horizon Worlds (2020-2022) — Creative Director at Archiact Interactive — Top-performing experiences for Meta's social VR platform
- FORM (2017) — Lead Game Designer at Charm Games — Award-winning surreal VR puzzle game
- Bully (2006) — Game Designer at Rockstar Games — Critically acclaimed open-world action-adventure
- Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City (2012) — Senior Game Designer at Slant Six Games
- SOCOM: Tactical Strike (2007) — BAFTA-nominated tactical game

## Core Expertise
- Creative Direction & Vision Definition
- Game Design Leadership
- VR/XR Development
- UX & System Architecture
- Player Motivation & Psychology
- Team Leadership & Mentorship
- Prototyping & Technical Implementation

## Previous Employers
- Cloudhead Games (2022-2025)
- National Film Board of Canada (2023)
- Archiact Interactive (2019-2022)
- Inscape Studios — Co-Founder (2018-2023)
- Charm Games (2015-2017)
- Kennedy Miller Mitchell / Team Bondi (2012-2013)
- Slant Six Games (2006-2012)
- Rockstar Games (2003-2006)

## Seeking
Open to Design Director, Creative Director, and Game Director opportunities.
